<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With --strip-unneeded, GNU objcopy removes all unreferenced local</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbols, and any unreferenced undefined external.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With --strip-unneeded-symbol we strip only specific unreferenced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// local symbol instead of removing all of such.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sym.Sym.StorageClass == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#a906c310d62ec1ae55afe3295a4fc2115afc617a23fd5e4cce7f2adfc7c2966e1c">IMAGE&#95;SYM&#95;CLASS&#95;STATIC</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sym.Sym.SectionNumber == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Config.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig/#a978856b980f494b38439e6915ebb08ab">StripUnneeded</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Config.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig/#a97da34bb10ec4abee4cf43b4271da29a">UnneededSymbolsToRemove</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/namematcher/#a8fe6d6e80304c85e35c03066ae1bcfa9">matches</a>(Sym.Name))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GNU objcopy keeps referenced local symbols and external symbols</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if --discard-all is set, similar to what --strip-unneeded does,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but undefined local symbols are kept when --discard-all is set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Config.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig/#ac6efd384d0ad969083034e1205ec5166">DiscardMode</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/objcopy/#ad8575ac23541d1433a8e492cc876f75aab1c94ca2fbc3e78fc30069c8d0f01680">DiscardType::All</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sym.Sym.StorageClass == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#a906c310d62ec1ae55afe3295a4fc2115afc617a23fd5e4cce7f2adfc7c2966e1c">IMAGE&#95;SYM&#95;CLASS&#95;STATIC</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sym.Sym.SectionNumber != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
